alert.note: Alert for La Sal and Abajo Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 29 at 2:41AM MDT until March 30 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT WEDNESDAY ABOVE 9000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 9000 feet. Snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches with locally higher amounts. * WHERE...La Sal and Abajo Mountains. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
